Actions.Name: Get National Generation Mix
Actions.Description: Generation Mix for the GB power system. Contains the following fuel types: gas, coal, nuclear, biomass, hydro, imports, solar, wind, other.

Actions.Name: Get National Carbon Intensity
Actions.Description: The API returns national carbon intensity data for current half hour. All times provided in UTC (+00:00)

Actions.Name: Get Carbon Intensity for England
Actions.Description: Get Carbon Intensity data for current half hour for England. All times provided in UTC (+00:00).

Actions.Name: Get National Carbon Intensity Factors
Actions.Description: Get National Carbon Intensity factors for each fuel type

Actions.Name: Get Carbon Intensity for Scotland
Actions.Description: Get Carbon Intensity data for current half hour for Scotland. All times provided in UTC (+00:00).

Actions.Name: Get Carbon Intensity for Wales
Actions.Description: Get Carbon Intensity data for current half hour for Wales. All times provided in UTC (+00:00).
